name: Substance enhanced shootout
description:
Instructions (IMPORTANT)

WASD movement

Left mouse click to shoot - infinite ammo but the gun jams at times, shoot until it fixes itself

The blue bar is drug level, it increases with green syringes. The more drugged, the better you see

The red bar is the toxicity level. It increases when youre drugged. If the toxicity is more than the drug level your vision blurs. Blue syringes heal toxicity

Shadows will follow you and if close enough shoot you

You can shoot em to death

Lastly, at times the power goes out and all lights go out for a few seconds, an alarm sounds when this happens. The player flashlight remains.

Survive.
